About Us

A Plus Tires & Auto Inc is a family-owned auto shop located in Clearwater, FL. With over 20 years of experience, we can provide you with exemplary tire and auto services.

Our mechanics will ensure that your vehicle runs smoothly. We're fluent in Vietnamese and Cambodian.

Give us a call to get FREE estimates on our auto and tire services. We return most calls on the same day.
